chunks.zh: 低层开发仔，越来越担忧被 AI 取代了
chunks.en: Low-level developers are increasingly worried about being replaced by AI.

chunks.zh: 21 年大模型爆发前夕转行做了开发，刚学会的技能还没捂热乎，就肉眼可见地迅速贬值。
chunks.en: I switched to development just before the explosion of large models in 2021. The skills I just learned are rapidly depreciating at a rate that is visible to the naked eye.

chunks.zh: 叠加上大环境恶化，择业/大学招生的滞后，不敢想未来有多惨。
chunks.en: Coupled with the deteriorating macro environment and the lag in career choices/university admissions, I don't dare to imagine how bad the future will be.

chunks.zh: 乐观预期，大模型这波已经到头。
chunks.en: Optimistically, this wave of large models is already at its end.

chunks.zh: 大模型编程的上下文只有万行级别，并且需要人工审核改 bug 。
chunks.en: The context of large model programming is only at the level of ten thousand lines, and it requires manual review to fix bugs.

chunks.zh: 这意味着初级程序员的编程技能贬值到白盒测试水平，大公司初级开发测试职位合并，基层开发维护多个微服务，小公司产品开发职位合并。
chunks.en: This means that the programming skills of junior programmers are depreciated to the level of white-box testing, junior development and testing positions in large companies are merged, grassroots developers maintain multiple microservices, and product development positions in small companies are merged.

chunks.zh: 初级开发职位缩减 50%。
chunks.en: Junior development positions are reduced by 50%.

chunks.zh: 悲观预期，大模型 5 年后到头，并且会出现针对编程做特化训练的大模型（目前看 claude 就在走这条路），编程技能比通用模型强 10 倍。
chunks.en: Pessimistically, large models will peak in 5 years, and there will be large models specifically trained for programming (currently, Claude seems to be going down this path), with programming skills that are 10 times stronger than general-purpose models.

chunks.zh: 大模型编程的上下文达到百万行级别，并且可以自行审核改 bug ，只需要人工验收。
chunks.en: The context of large model programming reaches the level of millions of lines, and it can review and fix bugs on its own, requiring only manual acceptance.

chunks.zh: 大公司产品开发测试职位合并，基层开发维护多个系统。
chunks.en: Product development and testing positions in large companies are merged, and grassroots developers maintain multiple systems.

chunks.zh: 初级开发职位缩减 100%。
chunks.en: Junior development positions are reduced by 100%.

chunks.zh: 超乐观预期，AI 热点一波续一波，续到 20 年后，AI 取代程序员之前先取代了 80%的非体力劳动，老爷们决定发善心养活所有人！
chunks.en: In a super optimistic scenario, AI hotspots continue wave after wave, lasting until 20 years later. Before AI replaces programmers, it will first replace 80% of non-manual labor, and the powers that be will decide to show benevolence and support everyone!

chunks.zh: 不是说没有可能，但是职业规划还是不要以此为基准预期了。
chunks.en: It's not to say it's impossible, but career planning should not be based on this expectation.

chunks.zh: 不知道接下来要做啥。
chunks.en: I don't know what to do next.

chunks.zh: 以前一直是新技术的拥护者，直到砸到自己头上，才感受到被淘汰的恐惧。
chunks.en: I used to be a supporter of new technologies, but it wasn't until it hit me that I felt the fear of being eliminated.

chunks.zh: 为什么总是传播焦虑？那怎么不去死？
chunks.en: Why are you always spreading anxiety? Why don't you just go die?

chunks.zh: 你就说什么职位不能被取代吧，医生？教师？律师？人行财？金融交易员？
chunks.en: Tell me, what positions cannot be replaced? Doctors? Teachers? Lawyers? People's Bank of China Treasury? Financial traders?

chunks.zh: 失业率因为 AI 超过 1/3 的时候，你信不信 AI 虚拟人也要交社保。
chunks.en: When the unemployment rate exceeds 1/3 because of AI, do you believe that AI virtual humans will also have to pay social security?

chunks.zh: 主要是你菜。
chunks.en: It's mainly because you're incompetent.

chunks.zh: 文科生来凑什么热闹？
chunks.en: What's a liberal arts student doing here?

chunks.zh: 真以为咱们这行是公交车？谁来都能上
chunks.en: Do you really think our industry is a bus? Anyone can just get on?

chunks.zh: 危言耸听。
chunks.en: Alarmist.

chunks.zh: AI 只是提高编程效率，我们实际写业务还是要人写的，需要的人还是一个不能少，现在谈取代为时尚早。
chunks.en: AI only improves programming efficiency. We still need people to actually write business logic. We still need the same number of people, so it's too early to talk about replacement.

chunks.zh: 跟风用 Claude3.7 做了生成天气卡片的，效果真的很好： https://chat.vacuity.me/#/share?key=m6v1uov3scia45pq
chunks.en: I used Claude3.7 to generate weather cards, and the effect is really good: https://chat.vacuity.me/#/share?key=m6v1uov3scia45pq

chunks.zh: 以后这几类可以留下1 真正的技术大牛，引领者2 AI+业务复合人才，不单单是开发者3 凑数骗甲方服务费的，当人头的
chunks.en: In the future, these types of people can stay: 1. True technology gurus, leaders 2. AI + business compound talents, not just developers 3. People who are there to make up the numbers and scam customers for service fees, just as headcount.

chunks.zh: 没办法，新技术来的时候，一定会造成行业岗位减少。
chunks.en: There's no way around it. When new technologies come, they will definitely cause a reduction in industry jobs.

chunks.zh: 跟财务软件刚刚兴起的时候，一大堆底层会计失业是一样的。
chunks.en: It's the same as when financial software first emerged, causing a large number of low-level accountants to lose their jobs.

chunks.zh: 线上缴费、买票，造成线下售票员的减少一样的。
chunks.en: Online payment and ticket purchases are the same as causing a reduction in offline ticket sellers.

chunks.zh: 以前都是互联网行业去革别的行业的命，现在搞到自己头上了。
chunks.en: In the past, the internet industry revolutionized other industries, and now it's happening to itself.

chunks.zh: 如果你 5 年后还是保留现在的初级开发水平确实是会被替代，5 年以后的人也不会是这样开发业务系统的。
chunks.en: If you still maintain your current junior development level in 5 years, you will indeed be replaced. People in 5 years will not be developing business systems in this way.

chunks.zh: 5 年以后的人也不是现在这样学习使用 ai ，你用现在的认知去想 5 年后的发展并且用现在的能力去匹配 5 年后的技术要求也肯定不行。
chunks.en: People will not be learning and using AI the same way in 5 years. It's definitely not going to work if you use your current understanding to think about the development in 5 years and use your current abilities to match the technical requirements in 5 years.

chunks.zh: @xubingok 错了，你跟 Linus 比 AI 编码差据<1 年吗
chunks.en: @xubingok Wrong, is your difference with Linus in AI coding <1 year?

chunks.zh: linus 甚至可以自己在 AI 帮助下重写个操作系统, 你可以吗
chunks.en: Linus can even rewrite an operating system with the help of AI. Can you?

chunks.zh: 例子极端了些, 意思是这个意思
chunks.en: The example is a bit extreme, but that's the idea.

chunks.zh: 是的，AI 目前在编程这方面最拿手编程也是最容易被 AI 替代的工作，没有之一
chunks.en: Yes, AI is currently best at programming, and programming is also the easiest job to be replaced by AI, bar none.

chunks.zh: 我觉得未来是这样的：一个大牛，配合 AI ，能代替技术一般的十个甚至二十个。
chunks.en: I think the future will be like this: one guru, with the help of AI, can replace ten or even twenty average developers.

chunks.zh: 走一步看一步吧
chunks.en: Let's take it one step at a time.

chunks.zh: 你和大牛在编码上的差距:>10 年
chunks.en: Your gap with a guru in coding: >10 years

chunks.zh: 你和大牛在使用 AI 编码上的差距:<1 年
chunks.en: Your gap with a guru in using AI coding: <1 year

chunks.zh: 努力吧.
chunks.en: Work hard.

chunks.zh: 不要成为被替代的那批人.
chunks.en: Don't be one of the people who get replaced.

chunks.zh: 来吧，要焦虑就焦虑个大的，互联网都要没了https://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2025/02/weekly-issue-336.html
chunks.en: Come on, if you're going to worry, worry big. The internet is going to disappear: https://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2025/02/weekly-issue-336.html

chunks.zh: 这才两年就达到这么好的效果，再过 10 年、20 年后大模型的确有取代底层职位的可能性，各行各业都会受到大模型的冲击，不仅是开发者。
chunks.en: It's only been two years and it's already achieved such good results. In another 10 or 20 years, large models will indeed have the possibility of replacing low-level positions. All walks of life will be impacted by large models, not just developers.

chunks.zh: AI 替代脑力，机器人替代体力工作越发少了
chunks.en: AI is replacing mental labor, and robots are replacing physical labor, so there are fewer and fewer jobs.

chunks.zh: @fengtaida 鸵鸟
chunks.en: @fengtaida Ostrich

chunks.zh: 强人工智能没来你怕个卵？
chunks.en: Why are you afraid when strong AI hasn't arrived?

chunks.zh: ai 别人能用你不能用？
chunks.en: If others can use AI, why can't you?

chunks.zh: 强人工智能来了你怕个卵？
chunks.en: Why are you afraid when strong AI arrives?

chunks.zh: 全人类 99%的个体都是命运共同体，天塌下来自有高个的顶着。
chunks.en: 99% of all human beings are a community of shared destiny. If the sky falls, the tall ones will hold it up.

chunks.zh: 首先，你的焦虑有没有意义，因为有 AI 的存在，你是比之前强大无数倍的你。
chunks.en: First of all, is your anxiety meaningful? Because with the existence of AI, you are infinitely more powerful than before.

chunks.zh: 你又何必在意你为程序员的这个职业呢？
chunks.en: Why do you care about your profession as a programmer?

chunks.zh: 以前你看不懂体检报告，现在有 AI 你基本上能够解决 80%的健康问题。
chunks.en: In the past, you couldn't understand medical examination reports. Now, with AI, you can basically solve 80% of your health problems.

chunks.zh: 以前你也不是律师，现在有 AI 的存在，只要不进入法庭，你比最好的律师也差不到哪去。
chunks.en: In the past, you weren't a lawyer. Now, with the existence of AI, as long as you don't go to court, you're not much different from the best lawyers.

chunks.zh: 在这种状况下，人再把自己定义为某个职业，不是浪费了这大好的时代吗？
chunks.en: In this situation, isn't it a waste of this great era for people to define themselves as a certain profession?

chunks.zh: 人挪活，总有新的需求产生只要能快速适应不用太担心怕的是原地踏步的
chunks.en: A change of scenery can bring new opportunities. As long as you can adapt quickly, you don't need to worry too much. What you should be afraid of is standing still.

chunks.zh: 保持身体健康，迎接变革的巨浪。
chunks.en: Stay healthy and embrace the giant wave of change.

chunks.zh: 低层次内卷毫无意义了
chunks.en: Low-level involution is meaningless.
